.. _reference.rfc4122.uuidv5:

===============
Rfc4122\\UuidV5
===============

.. php:namespace:: Ramsey\Uuid\Rfc4122

.. php:class:: UuidV5

    Implements :php:interface:`Ramsey\\Uuid\\Rfc4122\\UuidInterface`.

    UuidV5 represents a :ref:`version 5, name-based (SHA-1) UUID <rfc4122.version5>`.
